a.title: covid19
a.span: Guide Lines for Students to Work from Home

br.a: Guide Lines for Students to Work from Home Spanish Version

span.style: font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: The Food Service Department is continuing to provide breakfast and lunch to students each Tuesday and Thursday through April 17th, or until school is allowed to open again. Each student will receive two breakfasts and two lunches at a time.

strong.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

span.style: font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: . Delivery is available upon request. Please click on the link below to sign your student(s) up for meals. If you have already signed up, we will continue to provide your student(s) meals until you notify us otherwise.

strong.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

p.strong: YOU MUST SIGN UP NO LATER THAN FRIDAYS BY 10:00AM,

span.style: font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: or we will not be able to provide your children meals. If you have any further questions, please contact Erin Kerr at

a.style: color: rgb(17, 85, 204); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

span.style: font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: The Wiggins School District shall strive to provide a safe environment for all students and staff and meaningful opportunities and innovative educational programs for all students so that they reach their learning potential, including that they meet or exceed state and district content standards, through partnerships between home, school and the community.

span.style: font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;

br.br:
In compliance with Titles VI & VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, Title IX of the Education Amendments of1972; Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967,the Americans with Disabilities Act and Colorado law, Wiggins School District RE-50J does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, sex, religion, national origin, ancestry, creed, age, marital status, sexual orientation, disability or need for special education services in admissions, access to, treatment, or employment in educational programs or activities which it operates.
Complaint procedures for Title IX and Section 504 have been established for students, parents, employees and members of the public. The following person(s) have been identified as the designated employee(s) to coordinate compliance activities for the districts:
As referenced in Exhibit ACE-E-1, specific complaints of alleged discrimination should be referred to:
Superintendent of Schools
Wiggins School District RE-50J
404 Chapman Street
Wiggins, Colorado 80654
970-483-7762
kerrt@wiggins50.k12.co.us
The alternate compliance officer is:

Wiggins, Colorado 80654
970-483-7762
